title: Updated League after a long time of not playing and keep getting a connection error
body:
So, I've updated League because I haven't played since summer. However, whenever I try to log in, it says:
"Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944).
Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page."

Anyone know it can be fixed?

replies.body: Did you already work through the steps inside the [**guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944) that the error message linked?
